posts.title: Don't Miss Half Off Night at Record's Ping Pong Bar in Bentonville
posts.content:
Record welcomes a pop-up ping pong bar for the month of January! Don't miss the Florence & Flint Cookie Co. partnership, with entertainment by DJ Shortfuze on Saturday, January 23rd! (& there's more! A beer + shot + slice special for $11 hits the pop up this week!) A variety of Ping Pong themed cocktails are also available, including a whiskey mule from sponsor, Nine Banded Whiskey! We welcome guests of all ages, with an ID check and wristbands at the door.

  • Open Thursdays-Saturdays starting at 5pm for the month of January. No entry fee excluding live music nights. Game rental fees apply. Masks are required.
  • $20 per hour/per table.
  • Thursday: *Half-off* play 5pm-10pm
  • Friday: 5pm-11pm
  • Saturday: (Live Music) $5 cover charge 5pm-11pm
  • Looking to rent a table and lounge space for an after work get together, special occasion or celebration? Please contact sales@ropeswinggroup.com for more information.

Record is located at 104 SW A. St. Bentonville, AR. 72712. Free public parking is available nearby.

posts.title: Fayetteville Marketing Agency Offering 250K in DEI Investments
posts.content:
The Artists Evolution, a Fayetteville marketing agency, is now offering up to 250K to partner with women and minority entrepreneurs in order to bolster diversity, equity and inclusion efforts.

  • CEO Derek Champagne said the past year has been one of reflection, and that the agency wants to be part of the solution for more diversity, equality, and inclusion.
  • “We’ve added a new core value, which is about our communities matter, and that’s why we invest in them,” Champagne said. -Talk Business & Politics
  • Champagne said the agency's goal is to partner with around 10 minority and women entrepreneurs to establish and manage the agency’s presence in larger cities.
  • Potential partners looking to qualify for the incentive should have relevant experience, leadership and ties to the community in which they would establish partnership roots.

posts.title: 2021 Arkansas Football Schedule Released
posts.content:
The Arkansas Razorbacks will kick off the 2021 football season on Saturday, Sept. 4, in Reynolds Razorback Stadium against Rice University.

  • In an age-old rivalry that brings back memories of the retired Southwest Conference, Arkansas will be playing the Texas Longhorns on Sept. 11 in Fayetteville. -Pig Trail Nation
  • The Hogs will begin SEC play against Texas A&M on Saturday, Sept. 25, in Arlington.
  • Arkansas will arguably have the toughest schedule in the SEC, but we are excited to see what Coach Sam Pittman has in his playbook.
  • View the full schedule HERE.

posts.title: Walmart Picks Up the Pace
posts.content:
Store 100 in Bentonville is looking to expand its capabilities and service to shoppers by adding a regional fulfillment warehouse to its 406 SW Walton Blvd store location.

  • Announced yesterday, the fulfillment warehouse will be mostly operated by bots or robotic shoppers that will collect the items once your order is placed. The overall process makes pick-up more effective and efficient for both parties.
  • Walmart responded to the pivot of online shopping and pick-up by hiring an estimated 500,000 new employees this past year. No word yet on when the facility will be built, but City has approved the add-on.
  • As an order online and pick-up shopper, I am curious how these bots will select produce..

posts.title: Creating Startup Junkies: Venture Ecosystem Builders Release New Book
posts.content:
Startup Junkie founder Jeff Amerine and Conductor Managing Director Dr. Jeff Standridge are releasing their first co-authored book TODAY.

  • Creating Startup Junkies: Building Sustainable Venture Ecosystems in Unexpected Places will feature the authors' applied knowledge and experience in entrepreneurial ecosystem building. -Startup Junkie
  • The book focuses on the progressive idea of creating sustainable entrepreneurial ecosystems in unexpected places, and serves as a guide to create lasting venture ecosystems for community leaders.
  • Creating Startup Junkies includes a foreword from Congressman French Hill and includes ecosystem building tools and a strategic assessment and synthesis process.
  • Amerine and Standridge will host a virtual book signing today from 1-2pm CT to answer questions. A limited number of copies will be available. Order the book HERE.
